actions.name: Dune Terror
actions.description: Effect: The user takes 25% less damage while Dusty Weather is active, and the user is immune to the negative effects of Dusty Weather. The user's Ground-Type attacks deal 10% more damage.

system.description: Effect: The user takes 25% less damage while Dusty Weather is active, and the user is immune to the negative effects of Dusty Weather. The user's Ground-Type attacks deal 10% more damage.
